mailgun_failed_load_api_key: Chinese: Failed to load MailGun API key.
mailgun_failed_load_domain: Chinese: Failed to load MailGun domain.
mailgun_error_send_email: Chinese: Error in sending confirmation email, user registration failed.
confirmation_already_confirmed: Chinese: Registration has already been confirmed.
confirmation_resend_fail: Chinese: Internal server error. Failed to resend confirmation email.
item_name_exists: Chinese: An item with name '{}' already exists.
item_error_inserting: Chinese: An error occurred while inserting the item.
item_more_available: Chinese: More data available if you login
store_name_exists: Chinese: A store with name '{}' already exists.
store_error_inserting: Chinese: An error occurred while inserting the store.
user_username_exists: Chinese: A user with that username already exists.
user_email_exists: Chinese: A user with that email already exists.
user_not_confirmed: Chinese: You have not confirmed registration, please check your email <{}>.
user_error_creating: Chinese: Internal server error. Failed to create user.
user_registered: Chinese: Account created successfully, an email with an activation link has been sent to your email address, please check.
image_delete_failed: Internal server error! Failed to delete images
avatar_delete_failed: Internal server error! Failed to delete avatar.
